info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
I have stayed here before, so i knew that the location was very covenient. sadly, the original caretaker has passed but his son, a college freshman is available at all times.
highly recommended!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · August 2022,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: Great upscale unti in the heart of Uttara. the place was well kept and I felt very safe with the 24/7 security guard. it's located very close to nice restaurants and markets. This is definitely the nicest place I have stayed at in Dhaka. I would recommend Hasnat's place highly.
Hasnat is a great host! So easy to communicate with, the place were reasonably clean and tidy. Would recommend to any other guest and would delighted to go back at the property any time.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2020,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: My parents stayed here during their trip to bangladesh and they really enjoyed it. The place is sparkling clean and the host is very easy to communicate with. It’s also very spacious and Mr. Yunus, the caretaker, is a very honest and trustworthy person. My parents liked that it is so safe and they definitely plan to stay here again in the future.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · February 2020,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Airbnb was in a great location. From the airport its only short journey. 10 mins driving distance. The place was amazing, clean, fully furnished and has everything we would need. It was very close to all the restaurants, shopping malls, and local shops. There were 24 hours of security and view from the balcony was nice. The house was clean and the caretaker Yunus was a very helpful and lovely person. The only problem we had is the beds are not comfortable at all. There was no mattress on the bed and it felt like sleeping on rocks. There are 2 schools right in front of the building, so it a bit noisy in the morning.
We had a great time in this place. We checked excellent facilities and cleanliness with the reasonable price. Thank you so much, Hasnat!!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · August 2019,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
We stayed at Hasnat's place for the second time now and as before it was a very nice stay. The apartment is clean and in a very good and secure location.
As always Yunus (the caretaker) took very good care of us.
There's no better place in Uttara ;)

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2019,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment:
Hasnat is a great host and his place was amazing! Definitely will stay here next time. Amazing apartment, clean, well furnished and has everything we would need . Amazing rooftop. Very secured!
Yunus mia was very helpful and made us feel like home. He seemed to be honest and cares about interests of both the hosts and the guests.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2019,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Mr. Hasnat is a awesome person. I am from American and visiting Bangladesh. Mr Hasnat is highly co-operative person, friendly, helpful and honest gentlemen. Highly secure place. Nice location. Highly recommend to stay. Excellent service. Thanks Mr Hasnat for your hospitality.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2019,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Very clean and quieter good area

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · October 2018,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: Perfect place to stay in Uttura sector 7 for my bussiness trip !!! Very safe and homy !!! For sure I will stay again there !! Many thanks to MR YUNUS this marvelous guy ...!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · October 2018,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: The place is very clean and spacious. The location was secure since the building is gated. Coming from America that made us feel really safe. It was an ideal place for us since it is very close to various restaurants and shopping centers. The apartment looks exactly as it is in the pictures. Our caretaker, Yunus, was also very helpful whenever we needed him. The host was very accommodating and responsive when we needed to get in touch with him. Our stay was comfortable and we definitely plan to stay here again if we visit in the future!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2018,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment:
The apartment is located very close to shopping malls (Mascot, N. Tower, Rajlokkhi, etc) and good restaurants like Kabab Factory. Availability of Uber has made it very accessible. I used Uber to go the airport at 2 AM and it cost me only 150 Taka.
The helper is just a phone-call or shout away. He is very prompt, humble and helpful. Couldn't have asked for a better helper.
Will definitely use the apartment again in future, if available.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2018,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Staying at Hasnat's appartment in Dhaka is a real pleasure! From the airport it's only a short CNG-ride, even in Dhaka's famous traffic jam. Located in a quiet side street you can relax in a comfortable home with nice & clean rooms, modern AC-facilities, a spacious living room area and prepare breakfast & meals in a well fitted kitchen.
When you arrive you are welcomed by Hasnat's caretaker Yunus, who is such a dear person that we soon became friends. He even prepared us (jetlagged europeans) a dinner on our first evening!
The building is 24/7 well secured by always friendly guards, it's a 5 min walk to grocery stores or the next busy junction to get a rikscha.
Communication with Hasnat is flawlessly fast & clear.
Thank you, Hasnat & Yunus and all the best!
Stefan

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2018,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Nice layout, clean. Always great to have basic amenities and not have to run out and get them. Hosts rep stayed in adjacent room which I didn't know before booking but he was great. Checked in on my parents constantly and asked if they needed anything. Great place. Will stay again!
